body: You are extremely lucky and sometimes your allies are as well.
name: Bestow Luck
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/New Racial Rules/Human Feats/Bestow Luck

sections.body: You gain an extra use per day of your Defiant Luck ability. You can also use your Inexplicable Luck ability to grant an ally that can see and hear its benefit as an immediate action.
sections.name: Benefit
